meanings.sent1: The untorn paper was smooth and clean.
meanings.sent2: She carefully handled the untorn fabric to avoid any damage.
meanings.sent3: The untorn book cover looked brand new, even though it was old.
meanings.sent4: His untorn loyalty to his friends never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The untorn flag fluttered proudly in the wind.

meanings.definition: In a state of being whole and intact
meanings.sent1: The untorn puzzle was missing only one piece.
meanings.sent2: The untorn vase sat proudly on the shelf, unscathed by time.
meanings.sent3: The untorn cookie jar held a surprising amount of cookies.
meanings.sent4: Her untorn heart was finally at peace after years of turmoil.
meanings.sent5: The untorn map guided them safely through the forest.
